markdownRemark.html:
Queue Management is used to create and manage queues. Once a queue has been created, selected items can be automatically routed using the Rules resource. Items can be manually moved using the Case Management or Case Review resources.

The Cases In Queue column displays the number of cases currently in the queue. To view the list of cases in any given queue, select the green box indicating the number of cases in the desired queue.

Add Queue

To add a new queue, select the +Add Queue button.

Enter the queue name and queue description and select the Save button.
